com.cs7s.webpage.authentication

Interface AccessControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAccessControl

    public interface AccessControl
    The access controller that handles user sign in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isUserSignedIn()
      Returns true if there is a user that is signed in.
      boolean signIn(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Handles signing in of a user.

    • Method Detail

      • signIn

        boolean signIn(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        Handles signing in of a user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username.
        password - the password.
        Returns:
        true if the user successfully signed in.
